title: New ranked team formed Looking for a top laner! (bronze/silver) with champion pool below!
body: In this role i want someone who can play as a tank from the top lane! If your champion pool could consist of Sion, Maokai, Irelia, Rumble as well as champions like Lissandra And Kennen! Message me on the client my name is "Willasf" We mainly play on weekends by the way! ( Bronze Silver) or you can add my skype ktrogueee.

replies.body:

Top laners mainly played: Shen, Wukong, Garen and Jarvan.
Add me me please :) ign: Smiggie
